main event: A bright object reported in the sky over Colorado Springs, identified as a large white balloon-like shape.
interesting points: The sighting was reported directly by phone to the Duty Officer at the 4602d AISS., The observation lasted for 3 hours and 10 minutes., Other personnel also reported seeing the object., Lowry AFB released three Moby Dick balloons on the same day., The object was notably plotted over Colorado Springs.
witness description: reported by personnel at the 4602d AISS
